name: Tides of Dominion
description:
In Tides of Dominion, step into the role of a daring privateer. Choose from one of two factions locked in a ceaseless struggle for control of a persistent, ever-evolving maritime world. Participate in naval battles, conquer strategic islands, and gather loot to fortify your ship. In these unpredictable seas, the survival of the craftiest is assured - steer your fate in the world of Tides of Dominion!

From Humble Beginnings to Mighty Captain!


Begin with a modest vessel and strategically work your way to commanding grand and fearsome ships.

Clash and Repair!


Engage in naval battles, cause havoc to enemy ships, and remember - maintaining and repairing your own vessel is key.

Close-Quarters or Long-Range!


Choose your fighting style: participate in thrilling sword duels or take down opponents from a distance with your trusty sidearm.

Strategic Dominance in a Dynamic World!


In an ever-changing, persistent world, seize control of vital islands. Utilize their resources to your advantage and erect steadfast defenses to deter rival incursions.

Win the War!


Once all islands are under your faction's control, lead a decisive invasion of the enemy's homebase. With victory comes a world reset, providing a fresh start and new allegiances.
